pageContext.claim: “And, you know, I keep listening to the fake news that, ‘They won the House -- House, House, House.’ Nobody ever talks about the Senate. We won the Senate easily. In fact, we picked up two. And that hasn't been done in a long time.”
pageContext.analysis: This is absurd. When Trump said this, thousands of news reports in print, online and on TV had reported this basic fact, according to a search of the Nexis database. Picking up two Senate seats is an unremarkable accomplishment. Democrats did it in 2016.
